Source code for apis.permissions

from rest_framework import permissions

VIEW_METHODS = permissions.SAFE_METHODS
EDIT_METHODS = ('PUT', 'PATCH')
DELETE_METHODS = ('DELETE')


[docs]class CollectionPermissions(permissions.BasePermission):
    """
    Custom permission to only allow owners of an object to edit it.
    """


[docs]    def has_object_permission(self, request, view, collection):
        # View: GET, HEAD or OPTIONS requests.
        if request.method in VIEW_METHODS:
            return user.has_perm('view_collection', collection)

        # EDIT: PUT, PATCH requests.
        if request.method in EDIT_METHODS:
            return user.has_perm('view_collection', collection)

        # Delete: PUT, PATCH requests.
        if request.method in DELETE_METHODS:
            return user.has_perm('delete_collection', collection)

        return false
